summary: The diff successfully implements all three requirements: REQ-18 (full-screen photo viewer modal), REQ-19 (navigation arrows and keyboard controls), and REQ-20 (voice-to-text transcription fix). The PhotoViewer component was added with all requested functionality, EntryCard was modified to integrate the viewer, and the voice-to-text bug was fixed in both EntryForm and useSpeechRecognition hook by using a ref to persist transcript state.

hallucinated_features.description: Image counter display showing current photo position (e.g., '1 / 3') at the bottom of the photo viewer
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Adding photo metadata display in the viewer' as a non-goal, and the image counter was not requested in any requirement or acceptance criteria
